gracefml.bounding.BoundingFunction¶

class gracefml.bounding.BoundingFunction¶

Base class for all bounding functions.

Bounding functions return the expected domain of a uniform random variable, or can return None in order to not contribute to drawing bounds.

__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
